SEARCH
Package model

Class DataDAO

java.lang.Object
model.DataDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class DataDAO extends Object implements AutoCloseable
DAO for the database.

A bit of an amalgam in that it is capable of returning FlightWithDelay, AirlineWithData, Airport, or DelayReason, representing Flight, Airport, Airline, entries from the database tables.

Author:
23751662

    • getAllFlights

      public List<DataDAO.FlightWithDelay> getAllFlights(int page, int pageSize, String sortBy, boolean ascending) throws SQLException
      Returns all flights in db (limited by page_size(LIMIT) and offset(page_size*current page)
      Parameters:
      page - Current displayed page for SQL offset calculation
      pageSize - Intended page size, which represents the LIMIT size in SQL
      sortBy - sql sortB column
      ascending - true or false, converted to ASC or DESc in sql statement
      Returns:
      List of all FlightWithDelays found
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllAirports

      public List<DataDAO.Airport> getAllAirports(int page, int pageSize, String sortBy, boolean ascending) throws SQLException
      Returns a List of Airports in the db

      Appends SearchStatements.selectAirportMinimum with 'order' and 'sort' then passes to executeQuery in order to receive all airports

      Parameters:
      page - Current displayed page for SQL offset calculation
      pageSize - Intended page size, which represents the LIMIT size in SQL
      sortBy - sql sortB column
      ascending - true or false, converted to ASC or DESc in sql statement
      Returns:
      List of all airports found
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAirportByIata

      public DataDAO.Airport getAirportByIata(String iataCode) throws SQLException
      Takes a iata_code and returns Airport

      Uses SearchStatements.buildSearchAirportIata and exceuteQuery() to match iata code to Airport

      Parameters:
      iataCode - the iata code to match Airport iata

      An Airport object witht he matching iata
